imdb.plot outline: Ultimate Outdoors TV is an action packed half-hour docu-series that follows the true adventures of it's host, Master Outdoorsman and U.S. Coast Guard licensed Captain, Eddie Brochin. Episodes include traditional bow hunting for large game, classical falconry, saltwater sport fishing and inland fly-fishing. On the cutting edge, the show's cinematic approach to production brings a whole new look and feel to the outdoor genre, capturing WILD America from the coastal waters of Florida to Lake Michigan to the rough and tumble brushlands of South Texas and Mexico.
imdb.title: Ultimate Outdoors with Eddie Brochin
akas: Ultimate Outdoors with Eddie Brochin (United States)
plot: The true adventures of the host, Master Outdoorsman and U.S Coast Guard licensed Captain, Eddie Brochin.::Edwin Brochin

Ultimate Outdoors TV is an action packed half-hour docu-series that follows the true adventures of it's host, Master Outdoorsman and U.S. Coast Guard licensed Captain, Eddie Brochin. Episodes include traditional bow hunting for large game, classical falconry, saltwater sport fishing and inland fly-fishing. On the cutting edge, the show's cinematic approach to production brings a whole new look and feel to the outdoor genre, capturing WILD America from the coastal waters of Florida to Lake Michigan to the rough and tumble brushlands of South Texas and Mexico.::Edwin Brochin
